appendix.title: Changes
appendix.para: Major content changes from NISP Version 14 / ADatP-34(N)(1) to NISP Version 15 / ADatP-34(N)(2) include:

listitem.para: Draft FMN Spiral 5 Profile added as candidate (Vol 3).
55 RFCs processed. Details of the RFC changes are captured in .
Major cleanup of the NISP database
